description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Chicken Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Chicken Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375 g Select Chunky Salsa Sauce Medium

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Spoon polenta over chicken mix and top with remaining cheese. Grill for 10 minutes until golden. Season and garnish with parsley. Serve with green salad, if desired.
